name: Serpent
case: Multiple Cases of Missing Persons of Interest
info: A Sinner adept at Magic Damage whose Ultimate deals Core Damage. Normal Attack is dealt first to enemies with [Fang] marks together with additional (Attack * 40%) Magic Damage.

media.title: JP Serpent Character Trailer
media.author: 無期迷途 [むきめいと] ー公式ー

maniaIntensifyText: When an enemy with a [Fang] mark receives another [Fang] mark, the enemy suffers (Attack *200%) Magic Damage from Serpent.
criminalRecord:
One of the top performers in Phantom Entertainment. She searches for specific targets using a novelty show as a cover and confines them, among other things, without any regard for consequences. This has caused a panic and greatly disrupted the order in Eastside.

The subject once took extreme measures to put the Chief of the MBCC in danger in their confrontation. Therefore, the subject is regarded by the FAC as a highly dangerous Sinner and must be detained immediately.

--

Since her detention, regular examinations have found that the subject's stress has reached a dangerous level. The finding can explain her various behaviors prior to her detention. To lower her insecurity and stabilize her mental state, the MBCC conducts desensitization therapy on her in the form of monitored physical contact with other Sinners or Chief when her conditions allow it. So far, this has been effective and her various indicators have been kept within the normal range.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary

The subject awakened her power after being infected with Mania and bitten by a snake. When the snake venom combined with the Maniac energies inside her, she became a Sinner with some of the characteristics of snakes. The subject is good at covering her tracks and sensing heat sources, and her blood is toxic--these characteristics make her a great stealthy fighter.


+++* Awakening Signs

The subject doesn't know whether she got infected with Mania, but remembers being on the brink of death due to a snakebite she sustained as a teenager. She was saved by Mania, which awakened her power and turned her into a Sinner.


+++* Corruption State

Upon examination, it's been found that the subject suffers from a high level of Maniac corruption, but that her mind has not been affected significantly. No Mania Crystals have been found on her body, but her teeth, ears, eyes, and skin have taken on a snake-like characteristic.
ecbFlavourText:
"Why reject me?"
"I just want to be... I just want to be happy..."
interrogation1:
10 days after the end of the Sleepwalker incident, the Chief captures Serpent after a half hearted ambush. The Chief lets Serpent awaken in the Interrogation Room, and while not wanting to be harsh, they are intent on finding the Bottle of Dreams that Serpent used to create Ambrosia. Serpent plays coy, claiming that the danger is gone since Marv has been eliminated, while the Chief says they are being cautious as Sinners usually are more dangerous when they let themselves get caught. The Chief brings up evidence of Serpent's connection to two incidents: the "Pet Snake Incident", in which a family was devoured by their pet, and the mass murder of employees and guests of Phantom Entertainment. The Chief asserts that both incidents are evidence of Serpent's use of Ambrosia torture others. Serpent breaks down wondering why they continue to resist the happiness brought by Ambrosia, and the Chief says it's more an indulgence, an ignoring of pain, referencing the events of the Endless Carnival and [[[Hamel]]] as a similar set of events and not wanting the same for Serpent. Serpent goes back to the Chief's curiosity on why she allowed herself to be captured, her intent becoming very clear as she talks of wanting give Chief happiness. The Chief goes along with her asks wanting to take care of the problem at it's root. So, in the guise of a kiss Serpent bites Chief's fingertip sending them into a deep haze.

Serpent told that to know the truth behind everything, you must enter the "theater" with her. She kissed your fingertip and brought you together into the haziness to find happiness.
interrogation2:
Serpent reveals her past, starting with her awakening as a Sinner as she's transported to Eastside as food for the snake that she's now bonded with. When she overhears that there's a chance for happiness in Eastside, she awakens as a Sinner and asks the person who ordered the snake to go with him, showcasing her powers over the snake who previously nearly killed her. There she became a popular performer, but after years of being mistreated by the man who owns her, she commands her snake to kill him and his entire family, as they refused to give her the happiness that she craved. Serpent is then signed on to Phantom Entertainment by an agent who promises that that life will bring her happiness. When she is jealously despised by the other performers and the clients, who call her a monster and still see her as a freakish novelty, Serpent again orchestrates their deaths. To the Chief's surprise, neither of these incidents involved Ambrosia, raising questions about its origin. Internalizing the insults calling her a monster, Serpent concludes that she should go where the other monsters are and discovers the existence of the [[[BR-002 |Endless Carnival]]]. To the Chief's horror, Serpent decides to return to the Rust and join them. As she continues her story, the Chief notices that the real Serpent is looking sickly, as something is draining away at her life force.

Serpent experiences the girl's past with you together in the theater. You've found that the two cases related to Serpent have nothing to do with Ambrosia, so when exactly Serpent first got Ambrosia is still a mystery.
interrogation3:
Serpent is rejected despite how many times she tries to enter the Endless Carnival, as (unknown to her) Hamel's influence over the Black Ring causes it to reject any humans who approach. As she despairs being turned out from the only place she thought she had left to go, Marv appears at the Carnival gate and attempts to feed on her through his Ambrosia. However, Marv quickly turns on her, realizing that she has no happiness inside her for him to eat. Enraged, Serpent nearly kills Marv for this revelation, and he quickly submits to avoid death. He gives her his heart, which quickly transforms into the Bottle of Dreams, and tells her that she can use it produce Ambrosia. Serpent returns to Eastside and finds a desperate old woman being tormented by her cruel boss; she concludes that being a monster prevents her from having her own happiness, but that other humans might still be able to become happy. Thus, Serpent coerces the old woman into killing her employer, believing that it could make the woman happy even though the same actions never brought happiness to herself. When this fails to make her feel better, Serpent lets the woman drink from the Bottle of Dreams, immediately sending her into a joyful sleep. Finally having found a way to spread happiness, Serpent decides that this will be her goal from now on. With the story over, the Chief returns to reality and finds that Serpent has nearly force fed them Ambrosia while they slept. Although they initially push her away, the Chief notices that Serpent appears near half-dead and resolves to help her. So at the behest of Serpent's statements saying they'd only find the way to help her, in her Realm of Dreams the Chief drinks the Ambrosia and enters her dream world.

It turns out that th Endless Carnival was where Serpent meet Marv. But to your surprise, Serpent has made Marv her servant. But new mysteries have appeared: Where did Marv come from? Did it have anything to do with that eerie parade of monsters? You don't have time for these questions now, though. Serpent's life force is near the limit, and you have to save her from being controlled by Marv and the Bottle of Dreams.
interrogation4:
Inside Serpent's Realm of Dreams, the Chief finds that Serpent's obsession with happiness has allowed Marv's heart to latch onto her spirit like a parasite. As Chief races to save Serpent, her dream begins to shatter and reduce into a black sludge threatening to devour them both. Marv intends to consume Serpent, leaving her with nothing but her memories of pain. The Chief assures her that even if there's suffering in reality there's happiness to be found there too, citing their own happiness as the Sinners they've met since waking up. The two are attacked by a shadow of Marv who's trying to reclaim the Bottle of Dreams. The Chief attempts to talk Serpent out of her cycle of doubt. The Chief grabs for her explaining that despite suffering from love, she can derive happiness and that they can find happiness together. Their words have deep effect on Serpent, who with her newfound will stabs a hole in her chest to let the Chief extract the Bottle of Dreams from her heart. The Chief shattered the Bottle of Dreams, killing Marv and ending the danger. The discovery that Serpent did not create Marv with her power but rather just happened across him raises much more unanswered questions, but at least Serpent has been safely brought into the fold. While Serpent is a little rambunctious, she now has a new lease on life at the MBCC.

The only power that Bottle of Dreams has left, has attached to Serpent's heart, eating away and controlling Serpent, whose Realm of Dreams has shattered. You acknowledge, accept, and embrace the sufferings of Serpent, and wish to find the true happiness that belongs to her, together, along the path of future full of perils.
arrestRec1: When the Chief is on a mission in Eastside, Serpent gets in the way of and tries to provoke the Chief. After the Chief has solved everything, Serpent owns up to the crimes she has committed, and voluntarily agrees to be detained, though it is not clear if she has an ulterior motive.
arrestRec2: Serpent's origin is a mystery. She's registered as an orphan from Eastside by Phantom Entertainment. But further investigations show that she's closely linked to the Pet Snake Incident, the Disappearance of Phantom Entertainment Guests, and other strange cases.
arrestRec3: A family of four from a villa neighborhood in Eastside has gone missing mysteriously. According to info on the internet and testimonies of the family's neighbors, the family kept a python as a pet, which was taken care of by a girl. The girl and the snake has also gone missing. Through a comparison of different resources of information, it's been confirmed that the girl is Sinner Serpent.
arrestRec4: A recheck on all the information concerning Serpent turns up something bewildering about her, like where she attained the Bottle of Dream. The MBCC is convinced that some person or people put Serpent up to it, and decides to dig deeper into her background.
servingTerm1: The MBCC tried to detain Serpent and her snake in separate places, but the snake becomes agitated and restless in its cage, posing a threat to the lives of the staffers. Therefore the MBCC had to return the snake to Serpent's side.
servingTerm2: The subject is very demanding about the temperature and humidity of living quarters. She demands a constant temperature, or she will not cooperate in any operations. Once, on a hot summer day, the subject stripped off every piece of clothing, let her snake cover up the private parts, and carried out a protest, to express her dissatisfaction.
servingTerm3: The subject retains some habits she acquired as a performer with Phantom Entertainment, which help her build fairly amicable relationships in the MBCC. But when the subject perceives sarcasm or threat in the interlocutor's remarks, she tends to overreact. Some staffers said they felt their lives were under threat, and only a few Sinners find the way Serpent reacts quite amusing.
servingTerm4: Once, while talking with the Chief, the subject used her snake to bind her feet and the Chief's together to stop the Chief from leaving the room. When questioned, the subject claimed she just wanted a warmer to put under her blanket.
emotionCheck1:
[Serpent shakes the cup in her hand]

**Serpent:** Don't you want to taste it... Chief? **Chief:** ...... * **Prompt:** ...Just a little bit. * **Serpent:** Come on, Chief... Drink it and you'll feel the purest joy! * **Serpent:** 😘 * **Prompt:** Too sweet. I refuse. * **Serpent** Only the sweetest aroma can bring the ultimate joy… Sigh, it look like you still need to work on cultivating your taste, Chief. * **Serpent** 😥
emotionCheck2:
[Serpent is absentmindedly fiddling with the snake beside her and is suddenly intrigued by your arrival.]

**Serpent:** Oh... Chief, don't you want to get closer to them?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Is it not enough to just get close to you?
 * **Serpent:** Hehe, of course... At least these kids don't bite as hard as I do...
 * **Serpent:** 😉

* **Prompt:** There aren't any cobras this time, are there?
 * **Serpent:** Be very careful, Chief! My fangs are way sharper than theirs!
 * **Serpent:** 😘
supervision1:
++* ⚠ Autograph

//The autographs Serpent gave the fans are always unique.//

**System Notifications:** When Serpent signs the autographs for her fans among the staff members, she doesn't leave lip prints on them but her snake's tooth prints.

* **Prompt:** Serpent's autograph really is unique...
supervision2:
++* ⚠ Chief's Sacrifice

//An accident happened during the gala in the Recreation Area.//

**System Notifications:** Everyone likes Serpent's snake dance performance at the gala, but they are too afraid to be chosen as the "lucky audience" to be on stage and interact with her snakes.

* **Prompt:** Do something

**System Notifications:** You clench your teeth and "volunteer" to be that "lucky audience".
supervision3:
++* ⚠⚠ Justice is Done

//A staff member was bitten on the hand by the snake.//

**System Notifications:** A staff member was bitten on the hand by the snake and sent to the clinic for treatment. His hand was all swollen up. You come to call Serpent to account.

**Chief:** Did your snake do that?

**Serpent:** Yeah. You can just punish me.

* **Prompt:** But I wonder why.

**Chief:** Your snake listens to your words and never accidentally hurts anyone.

**Serpent:** He deserves it, saying something like "your snake would taste good with wine".

* **Prompt:** Ahh. That's why.

**Chief:** It's his fault. I'll have a talk with him.

**Chief:** But you shouldn't ask your snake to bite people. He didn't actually eat your snake.

**Chief:** Let's do this. You'll pay his medical fee.

**Serpent:** ...

**Serpent:** Hmph, all right. I'm doing this only because of you.
supervision4:
++* ⚠⚠ What Does the Snake Say?

//In a sunny afternoon, Serpent was sitting on the grass, talking with her snake.//

**System Notifications:** On a sunny afternoon, Serpent is talking with her snake on the grass.

**Chief:** Serpent, I have a question for you.

**Chief:** Can you really communicate with snakes?

**Serpent:** Of course.

**Serpent:** Snakes are smart. They have their own thoughts and moods.

* **Prompt:** Ask

**Chief:** Then how's its mood now?

**Serpent:** Not bad. It feels lazy taking a sunbath.

**System Notifications:** The snake suddenly raises its head and hisses.

* **Prompt:** What did it say?

**Serpent:** It says you look delicious and wants to take a bite.

* **Prompt:** D-Dangerous...
* **Prompt:** Goodbye. Have a good afternoon with your snake.
supervision5:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Malfunctioning "Alarm Clock"

//The surveillance system detected that Sinner Serpent did not arrive at the training room for training today.//

**System Notifications:** Surveillance System: Sinner Serpent did not arrive at the training room for training today. Go to inquire?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**System Notifications:** You go to Serpent's room and find that she's still sleeping.

* **Prompt:** Wake her up

**Serpent:** ...It's you?

**Chief:** Why didn't you go training? Are you feeling uncomfortable?

**Serpent:** I'm fine. I just overslept.

**Serpent:** All right, what time is it now?

**Chief:** Almost 10:30. The training started at 9:30. Why didn't you set your alarm clock?

**Serpent:** Alarm clock? I don't have one.

**Chief:** ?

**Serpent:** Usually my snakes will wake me up when it's time.

**Chief:** ...You use your snakes like this?

**Serpent:** Of course, my snakes are much more useful than alarm clocks.

**Serpent:** But it's getting cold these days. They might have gone into hibernation.

* **Prompt:** Warn
 * **Chief:** Anyway, you should obey the schedule of the bureau.
 * **Chief:** Just this once.

* **Prompt:** Buy an alarm clock for her
 * **Chief:** If that's the case, use an alarm clock in winter.
 * **Chief:** Don't be late or absent next time.
supervision6:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Poisonous Blood

//The plants in the greenhouse withered, possibly poisoned.//

**System Notifications:** Surveillance System: Received a message from [[[Pepper]]]. Please process.

* **Prompt:** Confirm

**System Notifications:** Video Playing...

**Pepper:** Chief... When I went to water the plants today, I found that the pot of sisal I planted last year withered, and there is blood on its leaf!

**Pepper:** It's a pity that my beloved sisal is dead... But I can plant another sisal, and I don't want anybody to be hurt!

**System Notifications:** Surveillance System: Video message over. Check today's footage of the greenhouse?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**System Notifications:** The footage shows that the only person entered the greenhouse before Pepper today is Serpent.
You find Serpent and see a bleeding wound on her finger.

* **Prompt:** Criticize
 * **Chief:** Pay attention next time. No plants can survive your poisonous blood.
 * **Serpent:** Yeah, it's normal for someone with poisonous blood not to be treated fairly.
 * **Chief:** Sorry, I am just worried about you.

* **Prompt:** Patch up the wound first.
 * **Serpent:** Wound? You are not here to scold me for poisoning the plants?
 * **Chief:** There is no need. I already know.
 * **Chief:** You were hurt by the sharp leaf of sisal, which caused your blood to touch the plant.
 * **Chief:** Your wound is still bleeding. You should take care of it now.
 * **Serpent:** ...Got it.
 * **Chief:** Be careful next time. Don't touch them with bare hands.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Are you trying to take me home? Hehehe... if you treat me as pet, it won't end well...

[Raise to Phase 1]
Hmm.. this reminds me of the ouroboros.

[Raise to Phase 3]
I will... wrap around you tightly...

[Level Start]
I've locked onto my target prey, hiss...

[Win Battles]
Thank you for making me feel that I am still alive.

[Lose Battles]
Haha... pain is a reassuring sensation.

[Ultimate Skill]
This ends here. You will thank me later.

[Die in Battles]
Do you feel... happy?

[Greeting]
Ah, a rare guest! You're here to see me again?

[Conversation 1]
I'm neither human nor monster, hmm... I think I might be a venomous snake?

[Conversation 2]
Will I get poisoned if I bite my own tongue...? You're so funny. It's as if snake venom got into your head.

[Conversation 3]
Everyone has the right to laugh. Whoever takes it away will go to hell.

[Special Conversation 1]
I can understand that some people don't like snakes, so you can also understand that I don't like some people, right?

[Special Conversation 2]
Misery is the culprit that destroys laughter, but also heralds the birth of a new world. What do you think?

[Special Conversation 3]
I love the way you smile, and it's even better if it's because of me.

[Full Compliance]
Can you give me a hug? Your temperature reminds me of spring, the time of awakening, the season of rebirth... I can hear our hearts beating together.

[Idle]
It's so quiet... it's as if the end of the world is nigh. Looks like I'll be able to get a good night's sleep.

[Annoyed]
Hmm... seems like you want me to take a bite of you?

[Special Attention]
To look for one leaf in an entire forest... to lock onto one monster in an entire herd... you really have a lot of energy.

[Dispatch]
If this can cheer you up...

[Dispatch Complete]
Did you like this performance?

[Level Up]
Hope you have fun...

[Pat Head]
The hero pierced the snake's cranium with this sword, beheading the monstrous serpent. You know where the cranium is? You just touched it.
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
I had a long dream, a dream of pursuing happiness, a dream of... rebirth.

[Greeting]
Oh... it's spring already? I'll get up then... Give me two more minutes...

[Ordinary Contact 1]
The sheets are so warm... Chief, if you can join me up here... I'll be very happy...

[Ordinary Contact 2]
I can't miss this festive holiday... But I need some more time to prepare...

[Ordinary Contact 3]
No one can take away my... my blankets... Take away my Chief... Hehe... Snore... Snore...

[Ordinary Contact 4]
Mmm... Time for spring cleaning? But my place is quite tidy already... Or do you want to help me?

[Idle] 
Sigh... The fireworks outside... really disturb my dreams...

[Special Attention] 
My gosh, I'm almost done dressing! If you keep rushing me... I'll bite you!

[Level Up}
Mmm.. Just a little bit longer...

[Pat Head]
Your hand's... still so warm...
nightmareTalent: When all allied units have no enemies in the grid they are in, a 15% damage boost is gained.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Dream Wonderland
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: New exclusive Ultimate [Brilliant Appearance]. Serpent enters the specified grid and generates [Starry Theater] within range for 20 seconds. Movement Speed of enemies within [Starry Theater] decreases by 40% and they gain 1 [Fang] mark every 2 seconds. Serpent gains 10%/12.5%/15% Attack bonus when she's within [Starry Theater]. [Brilliant Appearance] can only be used once every battle.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"Why reject me?"
"I just want to be... I just want to be happy..."

maniaIntensify.title: Bite Attack
maniaIntensify.text: When an enemy with a [Fang] mark receives another [Fang] mark, the enemy suffers (Attack*200%) Magic Damage from Serpent.

guide.title: Tips
guide.text: Don't let any enemy enter her grid and her range extends to 3x3. She's great at clearing out waves of enemies without requiring energy and you can use her ECB to group enemies and hit even more at once.

crimebrandSets.name: Broken Enemies
crimebrandSets.note: Deal increased damage to enemies that are corebroken.

crimebrandSets.name: Asura
crimebrandSets.note: Increases Magic Damage and Skill Damage. If bringing this set, make sure you are able to keep the shield on Serpent up or you will not receive the set bonus.

crimebrandSets.name: 3-pc set
crimebrandSets.note: If you don't have Heavy Contamination, you can run Pioneer or Corridor in III slot. Heavy Contamination is good if you can keep its set bonus passive up.

crimebrandSets.name: Diverged Ends
crimebrandSets.note: Increases Serpent's damage for 10 seconds after she kills an enemy.

crimebrandSets.name: Cheap Alternative
crimebrandSets.note: A very cheap set for if you have no other option.

shackles.title: The Show Begins
shackles.description: After using [Serpent Constriction] or [Brilliant Appearance], Serpent gains 20% Attack Speed bonus for 12 seconds.

shackles.title: Joy Comes First
shackles.description: After [Ophidian Domination] is cast, it has a 30% chance of being retriggered.

shackles.title: The Sufferer
shackles.description: [Serpent Constriction] Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Blade of Fang
skills.description: Serpent attacks with flying scythes, dealing (80% of her Attack) Magic Damage each time.

skills.name: Serpent Constriction
skills.description: After charging, Serpent smashes the ground with chains and deals (Attack * 600%) Magic Damage and 1 Core Damage to all enemies within range, leaving [Fang] marks on them for 12 seconds.

skills.name: Thermal Effect
skills.description: When Serpent's grid is free of enemies, her Normal Attack range extends to the 3x3 square around and gains 30% Normal Attack bonus.

skills.name: Ophidian Domination
skills.description: After triggering [Thermal Effect] 6 times, Serpent rolls in the air to give a sweep, dealing (Attack * 300%) Magic Damage to all enemies within range, leaving [Fang] marks on them for 12 seconds. This skill's unleash speed is affected by Attack Speed bonus.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Attack +6
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Attack +6, Unlock Mission: Dispatch Serpent 2 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Mission: Complete Serpent's Review
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Emoticons
Unlocking Data: Monitoring Record, Unlock Voice: Full Obedience, Unlock Sinner Title: Temperature-changing Creature

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - EN: Are you trying to take me home? Hehehe... if you treat me as a pet, it won't end well...
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - JP: 私を家に迎えたいの？うふふ～、ペット扱いしたら許さないわ～
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 나를 집에 데려가려고? 후후후~ 날 펫으로 삼으면 끝이 안 좋을 텐데~
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 你这是想接我回家？呵呵呵~把我当宠物的话可是不会有好下场的~
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 你這是想接我回家？呵呵呵~把我當寵物的話可是不會有好下場的~
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - EN: Hmm... this reminds me of the ouroboros.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: うーん……ウロボロスを思い出すわねぇ。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - CN: 嗯……这让我想起了衔尾蛇。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - TW: 嗯……這讓我想起了銜尾蛇。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: I will... wrap around you tightly...
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: あなたにしっかり巻きついてあげる～
voicelines.Level Start - EN: I've locked onto my target prey, hiss...
voicelines.Level Start - JP: 獲物見っけ。しゅしゅしゅ～
voicelines.Level Start - CN: 我已经锁定好猎物了，嘶~
voicelines.Level Start - TW: 我已經鎖定好獵物了，嘶~
voicelines.Win Battles - EN: Thank you for making me feel that I am still alive.
voicelines.Win Battles - JP: 生きる実感を与えてくれて、ありがとう。
voicelines.Win Battles - KR: 내가 아직 살아있다는 사실을 느끼게 해줘서, 고마워.
voicelines.Win Battles - CN: 谢谢你让我感受到，我还活着。
voicelines.Win Battles - TW: 謝謝你讓我感受到，我還活著。
voicelines.Lose Battles - EN: Haha... pain is a reassuring sensation.
voicelines.Lose Battles - JP: うふっ……痛みも安心をもたらしてくれるわぁ。
voicelines.Lose Battles - CN: 哈哈……疼痛也是让人安心的感觉。
voicelines.Lose Battles - TW: 哈啊……疼痛也是讓人安心的感覺。
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - EN: This ends here. You will thank me later.
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - JP: ここで眠って。私への感謝を抱きながら。
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - CN: 在此长眠，你会感激我的。
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - TW: 在此長眠，你會感激我的。
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Ah, a rare guest! You're here to see me again?
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 珍しいわね。また私を見に来たの～？
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 어, 무슨 일이야. 또 날 보러 온 거야~?
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 呀，真难得，你又来看我啦~？
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 啊，真難得，你又來看我啦~？
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: I'm neither human nor monster, hmm... I think I might be a venomous snake?
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: 私は人間でも化け物でもない。そうねぇ……一匹の毒蛇かしら？
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 난 사람은 아니지만, 그렇다고 괴물도 아니야. 음… 아마도 난 한 마리의 독사인 것 같아.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 我既不是人类，也不是怪物，嗯……我想我可能是一条毒蛇吧？
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 我既不是人類，也不是怪物，嗯……我想我可能是一條毒蛇吧？
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: Will I get poisoned if I bite my own tongue...? You're so funny. It's as if snake venom got into your head.
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 私が自分の舌を噛んだら中毒を起こすのかって？面白い質問ねぇ。蛇の毒で脳をやられちゃった？
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 내가 내 혀를 깨물어도 중독이 되냐고…? 너 되게 재미있네, 머리에 뱀독이라도 오른 거야?
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 我咬到自己的舌头会不会中毒……？你可真有意思，看上去像脑子中了蛇毒一样。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 我咬到自己的舌頭會不會中毒……？你可真有意思，看上去像腦子中了蛇毒一樣。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: Everyone has the right to laugh. Whoever takes it away will go to hell.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: 誰しも笑う権利を持ってるの。それを踏みにじる人は、地獄行き。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 모두에겐 즐거워질 권리가 있어. 그걸 방해하는 자는 지옥에 떨어질 거야.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 每个人都有欢笑的权利，剥夺它的人都不会有好下场的。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 每個人都有歡笑的權利，剝奪它的人都會下地獄的。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: I can understand that some people don't like snakes, so you can also understand that I don't like some people, right?
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: 蛇が嫌いな人がいるように、私にも気に入らない人がいるの。あなたなら理解できるでしょう？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 난 뱀을 싫어하는 사람이 있는 것도 이해해. 그러니 내가 일부 사람들을 싫어하는 것도 이해해줄 수 있겠지?
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 我能理解有些人不喜欢蛇，那你应该也能理解我不喜欢有些人吧？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 我能理解有些人不喜歡蛇，那你應該也能理解我不喜歡有些人吧？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: Misery is the culprit that destroys laughter, but also heralds the birth of a new world. What do you think?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 苦しみは喜びを奪う元凶だけど、世界を再生させる兆しでもある。あなたはどう思うかしら？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 고통은 즐거움을 파멸시키는 원흉이지만, 그와 동시에 세계가 되살아나는 징조이기도 해. 네 생각은 어때?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 苦难是毁灭欢笑的罪魁祸首，但也是让世界重生的前摇，你觉得呢？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 苦難是毀滅歡笑的罪魁禍首，但也是讓世界重生的前置準備，你覺得呢？
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: I love the way you smile, and it's even better if it's because of me.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: あなたが笑うところを見るの、好きよ。私のことで喜んでくれているなら、なおいいわぁ。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 네가 즐거워하는 모습을 보는 게 좋아. 만약 그게 나로 인해 즐거운 거라면 더더욱 좋겠지.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 我喜欢看你笑起来的样子，如果是因为我而感到开心，那就更好了。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 我喜歡看你笑起來的樣子，如果是因為我而感到開心，那就更好了。
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: Can you give me a hug? Your temperature reminds me of spring, the time of awakening, the season of rebirth... I can hear our hearts beating together.
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: 抱きしめてくれない？あなたの温度が、春を、目覚める時を、蘇生の季節を思い出させてくれるの……私たち二人の心臓の鼓動が聞こえるわぁ。
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 나 좀 안아줄래? 네 체온은 따스한 봄날 같거든. 만물이 잠에서 깨어나, 새로이 탄생하는 계절 말이야… 우리 둘의 심장이 함께 뛰고 있는 게 느껴져.
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 可以给我一个拥抱吗？你的温度让我想起了春天，苏醒的时间，重生的季节……我能听到我们两个的心脏在一起跳动。
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 可以給我一個擁抱嗎？你的溫度讓我想起了春天，甦醒的時間，重生的季節……我能聽到我們兩個的心臟在一起跳動。
voicelines.Idle - EN: It's so quiet... it's as if the end of the world is nigh. Looks like I'll be able to get a good night's sleep.
voicelines.Idle - JP: 静かねぇ……世界の終わりみたい。これでぐっすり眠れる。
voicelines.Idle - KR: 조용하네… 마치 세상의 종말 같아. 푹 잘 수 있을 것 같네.
voicelines.Idle - CN: 好安静啊……就像世界末日一样，看来能睡个好觉了。
voicelines.Idle - TW: 好安靜啊……就像世界末日一樣，看來能睡個好覺了。
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Hmm... seems like you want me to take a bite of you?
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: うふふ……噛んで欲しいのぉ？
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 唔……看来，你想让我咬你一口？
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 唔……看來，你想讓我咬你一口？
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: To look for one leaf in an entire forest... to lock onto one monster in an entire herd... you really have a lot of energy.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 森の中から一枚の葉っぱを探す。化け物の群れから一匹の化け物に目をつける。あなたって本当に凄い人ねぇ。
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 괴물 무리 속에서 단 한 명의 괴물만 바라보고 있다니, 그야말로 사막에서 바늘 찾기 수준인데. 집중력이 꽤 좋구나?
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 在一座森林里寻找一片叶子，在一群怪物中紧盯一只怪物，你的精力可真不错。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 在一座森林裡尋找一片葉子，在一群怪物中緊盯一隻怪物，你的精力可真不錯。
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: If this can cheer you up...
voicelines.Dispatch - JP: これであなたの機嫌を取れるなら～
voicelines.Dispatch - CN: 如果这样能让你开心的话~
voicelines.Dispatch - TW: 如果這樣能讓你開心的話~
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: 今回の演出、満足してくれたかしら？
voicelines.Level Up - JP: 喜んでくれるといいんだけど～
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: The hero pierced the snake's cranium with his sword, beheading the monstrous serpent. You know where the cranium is? You just touched it.
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: 勇者が剣を蛇の頭部に刺して、邪悪な大蛇を殺したの。その頭部がどこにあるか知っているかしら？あなたがさっき触ったトコよ。
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 용사는 사악한 뱀의 정수리를 꿰뚫었지. 정수리가 어디인 줄 알아? 네가 방금 쓰다듬은 곳이야.
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 勇者用剑穿过蛇的颅顶，斩杀了凶恶的巨蛇，知道颅顶是哪里吗？就是你刚才抚摸的地方。
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 勇者用劍穿過蛇的顱頂，斬殺了兇惡的巨蛇，知道顱頂是哪裡嗎？就是你剛才撫摸的地方。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: I had a long dream, a dream of pursuing happiness, a dream of... rebirth.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 長い夢を見たの。幸せを追い求める夢よ。生まれ……変わる夢。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 엄청 긴 꿈을 꿨어. 행복을 좇아… 다시 태어나는 꿈이었어.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 我做了一个很长的梦，一个追逐快乐的梦，一个……重生的梦。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 我做了一個很長的夢，一個追逐快樂的夢，一個……重生的夢。
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Oh... It's spring already? I'll get up then... Give me two more minutes...
voicelines.Greeting - JP: ふぁ……もう春？すぐに起きるから……もうすぐ……あと2分……
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 으으… 봄이야? 곧 일어날게… 곧… 2분만 더 줘…
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 唔……春天啦？我马上就醒……马上……再给我两分钟……
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 唔……春天啦？我馬上就醒……馬上……再給我兩分鐘……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: The sheets are so warm... Chief, if you can join me up here... I'll be very happy...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: 布団がすごくすごく温かいわぁ……局長が一緒に寝てくれたら……もっと幸せなのに……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 이불이 너무 따뜻해… 국장이 함께해주면… 더 행복할 텐데…
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 被子好暖和好暖和……要是局长能陪我一起……我会觉得更快乐的……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 被子好暖和好暖和……要是局長能陪我一起……我會覺得更快樂的……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: I can't miss this festive holiday... But I need some more time to prepare...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: この楽しいお祭りには、私が欠かせないの……ただ、もう少し準備する時間が必要ね……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 행복한 기념일에 내가 빠지면 안 되지… 다만, 시간을 조금만 더 줘…
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 这快乐的节日，少了我可不行……只是，需要再给我一点准备时间……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 這快樂的節日，少了我可不行……只是，需要再給我一點準備時間……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - EN: No one can take away my... my blankets... Take away my Chief... Hehe... Snore... Snore...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - JP: どんな小悪魔にも、私とふと……ふとんを……私と局長を引き離すことはできないわ……ふふ……うふふっ……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - KR: 그 누구도 나와 이불을… 나와 국장을…떨어뜨려 놓을 수 없어… 히히… 후… 후…
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - CN: 哪里来的小妖精都不能分开我和被……被……分开我和局长……嘿嘿……呼……呼……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - TW: 哪裡來的小妖精都不能分開我和被……被……分開我和局長……嘿嘿……呼……呼……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - EN: Mmm... Time for spring cleaning? But my place is quite tidy already... Or do you want to help me?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - JP: うーん……大掃除？でも、私の所は結構キレイでしょ。それとも……手伝ってくれるのかしら？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - KR: 음… 대청소하려고? 그렇지만 여기는 엄청 깨끗하… 진 않네. 좀 도와줄래?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - CN: 嗯……要大扫除？可我这里不是挺整洁的……或者，你帮帮我嘛？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - TW: 嗯……要大掃除？可我這裡不是挺整潔的……或者，你幫幫我嘛？
voicelines.Idle - EN: Sigh... The fireworks outside... really disturb my dreams...
voicelines.Idle - JP: うう……外から聞こえる花火の音……睡眠妨害よ……
voicelines.Idle - KR: 아… 창밖의 폭죽 소리 때문에… 잘 수가 없네…
voicelines.Idle - CN: 唔……窗外的烟花声……还真是扰人清梦呢……
voicelines.Idle - TW: 唔……窗外的煙花聲……還真是擾人清夢呢……
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: My gosh, I'm almost done dressing! If you keep rushing me... I'll bite you!
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: あらぁ、もうすぐ着替え終わるわよ。これ以上急かすと……あなたを噛んじゃうから！
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 아이참, 금방 다 입을 거야! 또 재촉하면… 확 물어버린다!
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 哎呀，我马上就穿戴好了！再催我……我可就咬你了！
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 唉呀，我馬上就穿戴好了！再催我……我可就咬你了！
voicelines.Level Up - EN: Mmm... Just a little bit longer...
voicelines.Level Up - JP: うーん……もう少し寝かせてぇ……
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: あなたの手……相変わらず温かいのね……
